title: Manchester United join Man City, Arsenal and Liverpool in race for £85million Torino striker Andrea Belotti
text:
Bel of a fee Manchester United join Man City, Arsenal and Liverpool in race for £85million Torino striker Andrea Belotti 
Reports in Italy claim Red Devils sent scouts to watch Italy star score brace against Pescara as Jose Mourinho eyes move Gossip Comments MANCHESTER UNITED have joined the race for £85million Andrea Belotti. 
Reports in Italy claim the Red Devils are the latest European giant to be keeping taps in the Torino striker. EPA 5 Manchester United are interested in Torino striker Andrea Belotti 
According to TuttoMercatoWeb , United scouts were in attendance to watch Belotti net a brace in Saturday’s 5-3 win over Pescara.

Real Madrid , Bayern Munich and Paris Saint-Germain are also all believed to be keeping tabs on the star. Belotti, 23, has helped himself to 30 goals in 59 games since joining Torino from Palermo in 2015. 
‘The Rooster’ signed a new four-year deal in December and the Serie A side will demand his £85m release clause is paid in full before any move can materialise. 
But that should prove no hurdle to United boss Jose Mourinho – who is likely to have cash to burn this summer. 
Anthony Martial has been strongly linked with a move away from Old Trafford after failing to impress the Portuguese chief. Reuters United boss Jose Mourinho could stump up £85m for Belotti Getty Images 5 Antoine Griezmann is another target of Mourinho’s at Old Trafford 
United have been strongly linked with a world record move for Atletico Madrid superstar Antoine Griezmann next summer.
